评论概述: Love these sweaters and have several of them.
评论详情: I have bought a lot of color variations and they are so comfortable. They are flattering to wear and I mostly wear blue jeans with them.  When another color variation comes up, I will add to my collection!!
I love the fit and look of this top. Great quality too. I highly recommend.

评论概述: Huge!  Buy the Dokotoo one instead
评论详情: I bought this one and compared this sweater as a small with a Dokotoo small of this exact sweater and this one is huge.  The Dokotoo is much more flattering and to size.
I get lots of compliments wearing this sweater. It’s light weight, washes well (delicate, hang to dry). Roomy fit but not “body”.
This is a beautiful sweater and wanted to keep it but it runs big so I returned.

Cute and soft sweater.  Gave this to my daughter as a gift. She loves that it is lightweight and the colors are muted.  Looks great with jeans or slacks.  Only been washed a couple of times but so far it's holding up.
Love the fit, washed well, perfect transition piece, could add layers if needed
Lightweight striped sweater, looks nice on you

This sweater fits much better than I thought it would. Fit is true to size, I ordered a small and it fits perfect. The colors are exactly as pictured. My only complaint would be some of the stitching is a little off, but not super noticeable. I washed it and did not dry, seems to hold up well so far. Will be ordering other colors!
Material was thinner than expected. Thought it would be more like a sweater. Cute, but not for me.
This is a fun sweater but I ordered my regular size medium and it was a bit over sized.
Love the colors in this sweater. Size is true to size guide. I think it is a Spring Summer sweater.  I definitely look forward to wearing it. The quality is excellent!

评论概述: Great quality. True to size. Great.Price.
评论详情: Really liked the fit and look of the Light sweater. Will buy other colors from the same vendor. Can wear during three seasons. So comfortable.
Great light weight sweater.  The black stripes with the beige is very striking.  Length covered my behind so that good.  I'm 5'4 and about 158.  Ordred a large and it's roomy without being sloppy
I love all the tops I have purchased of this brand.
I loved this so much I bought it in another color. Great for travel, running errands or a trip to the park. Super versatile and well made.
This is a nice light weight, good quality sweater.  It looks great with jeans and casual pants!
The color was more vibrant in person. It fit as expected. Good quality. Thin sweater that isn’t too bulky. Easy to tuck. Soft fabric and easy to wash.
I wore this on a trip and someone told me I looked like a classy lady.
Nice cheerful top. Many compliments. Thick as a sweatshirt but more versatile.
Love the colors but for sure size down!!
love this item it feels nice to wear and goes with so much. The colors and size are true to advertising.
I liked the crisp trim of color on the black and white strip sweater.  Great weight for fall, easily fit under a jacket.
My daughter was very happy with it
Color is great.  Perfect for jeans and casual
This sweater is super soft!  Love the colors.
Runs VERY large, order a size or 2 lower.

This sweater is a nice light knit. I like the high/low hem. It’s incredibly oversized and while I wear a large, ordered a large, the large is way too big, almost sloppy looking. The sleeves are even too long. Order smaller than your norm!
Nice !

The quality is outstanding—soft yet durable, with just the right amount of warmth without being too heavy. The stripes are beautifully designed in a range of colors that make it easy to pair with almost any outfit. Whether you're layering it on cooler mornings or throwing it on as the day warms up, it strikes that perfect balance between style and comfort. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a versatile and stylish piece!
Can’t beat it for the price. Very light weight and has held up through more washes than I would have expected for the price.

评论概述: Several Issues from the Get Go
评论详情: First, the materials listed on the page I ordered it from said it was polyester, nylon, and viscose. However, the garment has a label that says 100% rayon. Quite a difference, not even close.  Second, the garment has no washing or drying instructions in garment .It is on on the page I ordered from, , but the material is completely different so not sure. Most rayon materials do not go in the washing machine..  I do like the fit of the shirt for the most part - it is oversized , but it is particularly baggy around the waist and I have a little pouch. I bought it in my usual size large. I’m afraid the hem of it is going to stretch out after a while. The material is very soft and thin, not a sweater material at all, very thin almost like a thin summer weight t shirt.  Complete misrepresentation from the advertisement of the material, saying that it’s a sweater as well as no instructions at all to wash. How is that so difficult to do?. And the material is not what was mentioned.  I’m keeping it because I live in Florida and I could still wear this ,just not in cool weather. The price was right but now I know why. I don’t think I got the product that I originally ordered at all, because it took a long time to get here as well.

This has a high low hem a bit oversized comfy light weight sweater not to thick for these cooler fall days, I can wear now.  SO IN STYLE,  good quality for the value. I haven't wash it yet but looks as it will hold up very well.

Very comfortable and ever so cute I received many compliments the first day I wore it to work. The accent red/orange strip just sets it off.  I did wash it in washer/dryer and thought it shrunk some but not enough to make a difference I would suggest gentle cycle and lay out to dry.
This washed up nicely and is very comfortable and lovely piece to wear. I recommend.
Very lightweight sweater.  It’s a fun piece that looks cute with jeans. Not very high quality.

评论概述: Really wouldn't consider this a sweater.
评论详情: I love this top.  I wouldn't consider it a sweater because it is 100% rayon.  Although it has to be hand-washed and laid flat to dry, it is worth it.  You can wear it year round.  I got the black and white stripes with the red trim and plan on ordering it in more colors.

The style of this sweater is really cute & on-trend. I purchased my usual size. The sleeves, however, are overly long. The fabric pools at your wrist which just looks sloppy in a striped pattern. If you always want to push your sleeves up (as shown on the model) or your arms are longer than average, this is the sweater for you. If not, don't bother purchasing.
This is the cutest and most comfortable top. I’m not an easily impressed Texas woman but. Yes!

Expected this to be a bit thicker grade of fabric. It's much thinner than I expected. Not happy about receiving an obvious return with the return tracking papers inside the package, when I paid for "new".
Loved this when i 1st got it. After 2-3 washings it shrunk up badly.

I’m 5’2” and 120lbs. I give this sweater 5 stars because: a) It’s comfortable. b) The size fits as described, albeit a bit loose, but hangs nicely. c) And it looks pretty darn good on me!  I highly recommend!
This is really cute, spring sweater. It's thin and I liked the lose fit of the small (5 ft, 112).

I was so surprised by the quality and comfort of this sweater. The colors & pattern is so pretty and I wear it a lot. I even went back and bought a second color. Excellent light weight everyday casual choice.
Love this sweater. So stylish, lightweight and TTS. Not oversized but doesn’t fit snug!
I like the fit, the weight and color. But it definitely is not soft feeling.
I love this sweater, it fits great, I may have to order a couple more.
I’m very happy with this purchase !
Super cute but runs so big.  I’m 5 2 and drowned in it but it is worth the buy.
A bit oversized I orders a small and still a bit large . But cute

评论概述: Looks good with slacks and jeans.
评论详情: Easy to slip on and run out the door in a hurry. No buttons!
I wear this alot, dressed up and down with jeans.
I have 2, ordered this for xmas gift. Nice lightweight sweater, have gotten compliments on it. I'm 5'2, 175 and got the xl and it fits nice, loose enough. Nice quality too

This is listed as a sweater. It’s really not. It’s a slightly thicker long sleeve shirt. The color and pattern are as pictured, but it wasn’t very soft and didn’t really have a great shape. I just didn’t love it. So I returned.
Great top! Fits great and washes wonderful
ok
Nice fabric, exactly as pictured, true to size.
Fit true to size - a bit of a boxy fit This is not a heavy bulky sweater.
Looks cute.  Fit is great. Not really a sweater- more of a long sleeve top which is what I wanted.  I hope it holds up in the wash.
I'm an Amazon Vine Reviewer - love this top....fun to wear....easy to use with pants, skirts, or tights.  So versatile and comfortable.  Fits well.

评论概述: Its a really cute top, good quality and just a nice casual top
评论详情: First time Ive bought any clothes from Amazon for me. I saw the colors and loved it. It is made well, and easy to tuck into jeans if i want. Two thumbs up on this!

This sweater works in so many ways, my favorite way to wear it is with a nice pair of jeans, for an afternoon look. It is just a little wide on the sides, which makes it hang really nice without being too baggy.  The seams at the shoulders hang just slightly to the side for a nice look.  When it's a little cooler out, I like wearing it with a black hoodie or even a black blazer, creating a completely different, evening look.  It's a very comfortable knit, even without an undershirt.  Really like this sweater, definitely getting it in other colors.

I absolutely love this sweater! It can easily be a 4 season sweater. It’s super soft and lightweight and well made. It fit perfectly for that cozy look without looking oversized or sloppy. It’s long enough in the back that you can get away with pairing it with leggings.

Nothing super special about this one.  It's really thin but will be a good fall/spring top with black cropped pants and flats.  Kind of giving Parisian vibes so I plan to wear with my new Amazon trench coat (see my review!).
This sweater is soft, lightweight and super cute.  It did run big on me-ordered a medium and returned quickly for a small. for reference I'm 5'8 130# 32C.  The medium size was just swimming on me.
Love the strips on this top. Fits incredibly well. Comfortable, adorable for a fall day. Perfect texture, it's not too thick in material. Washes well.

Loved the stripes and orange-red detail on the sweater I got, but sadly it’s just an awkward fit. The length in front hits right at my hipbones and is slightly longer in the back. Maybe it’s the pear-shaped millennial in me, but I feel like this would be so much cuter in a tunic length. The trendy girlies can probably do a French tuck with this one, but mid-sized mom bod me finds that looks awkward. On top of the weird length, something about the construction of the shoulder seams makes them stick out adding more bulk to my already bulky arms. Sadly, this one is just a “no” for me :(

I love this sweater!  I am actually wearing it right now.  It's lightweight so it's not super heavy and the material isn't itchy.  It's a good length but I have a longer torso so I do wish the front was just a little longer.  But other than that it's a great  buy!

评论概述: Very nice knit and design- only slightly oversized
评论详情: This is a find! I love the knit of this Anrabess sweater- It is soft and very comfortable, and I ordered my usual medium size.  This is TTS mostly; I think Anrabess does run a bit large most of the time, since once again with one of their sweaters, I could have gotten away with a small.  For reference I am 5'5" and 170lbs, medium, hourglass build, (41,31,43) and 36DD.  With a large bust it's never going to fit like it does on the model but it is a great piece regardless. The colors are vibrant and beautiful, the red on this was a bit worrying when I ordered this sweater, it looked washed out and a bit more salmon than red, but upon receiving it it is in fact an orange red, not salmon. I will definitely wear this for work and play, it's a great sweater that fits well and is soft and comfy.
I was a little surprise to find this sweater was so thin. It seems a little see through also. Really cute, comfy  and casual.
